title: Ep 128 | 3 Things Phil Robertson Won't Say Again & Allie Beth Stuckey on Toxic Self-Love Culture
description:
Phil reveals three things he's learned never to say, including one remark he won't make to a woman ever again after an extremely awkward moment. Allie Beth Stuckey, host of the "Relatable" podcast, joins the Unashamed crew to discuss her new book, "You're Not Enough (and That's Okay): Escaping the Toxic Culture of Self-Love." She talks with Phil, Jase, and Al about how to articulate a biblical worldview in our hostile culture and one big thing social justice theology misses. Phil remembers a questionable catfishing trick from his lawless days. And the guys debut the new Unashamed Lair.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
